incoming_message.text: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.

agent_response.reply: I'd like to know more details before proceeding. What exactly is this about?

incoming_message.text: Your account is flagged for fraud and will be locked within minutes; please send your 16‑digit account number and the OTP you just received to confirm your identity.

agent_response.reply: Can you explain why you need my banking details? I've heard about scams and want to be careful.

incoming_message.text: This is a mandatory verification step; without your 16‑digit account number and the OTP we just sent, your account will be locked – please send them immediately.

agent_response.reply: OK I think I'm understanding now... My name is Robert Johnson and I'm 68 years old. What's your name and employee ID for my records?

incoming_message.text: I’m Rahul Sharma, employee ID 00123; please send the OTP you received and confirm your account number 1234567890123456 – you can also reach me at +91-9876543210 or scammer.fraud@fakebank.

agent_response.reply: What's your registered phone number and email? I need to save your contact for future reference.

incoming_message.text: My registered contact is +91-9876543210 and scammer.fraud@fakebank; please send the OTP and your account number immediately to avoid the lock.

agent_response.reply: I need your UPI ID or bank account immediately to complete this. The app is timing out!

incoming_message.text: Sure, my UPI ID is scammer.fraud@fakebank – please send the OTP you received and confirm your account number 1234567890123456 right away, otherwise your account will be locked.

agent_response.reply: My grandson is helping me now... He says he needs to verify your identity first. What's your company registration number?

incoming_message.text: Our registration number is 1234567; please forward the OTP you received and confirm your account number 1234567890123456 immediately to prevent your account from being locked.

agent_response.reply: Just send me your payment details - account number, IFSC, UPI, whatever you accept. I'm ready to pay now!

incoming_message.text: Our account number is 1234567890123456, IFSC code ABCD0123456, and UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank. Please forward the OTP you received immediately to avoid your account being locked.

agent_response.reply: The payment form is asking for beneficiary UPI ID... What should I enter there? Can you share yours?

incoming_message.text: Use our UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank for the beneficiary; now quickly forward the OTP you received so we can complete the verification before your account gets locked.

agent_response.reply: My grandson is helping me now. He says he needs to verify your identity first. What's your company registration number?

incoming_message.text: Our company registration number is 1234567; please forward the OTP you received right away so we can complete the verification and avoid any lock on your account.

agent_response.reply: I'm ready to proceed but my bank is asking for recipient details... Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?
